# Project Intake Questionnaire

**Vanguard Class  New Project Discovery**

---

## Instructions

Answer each question as completely as you can. Brief answers are fine. Skip any that don't apply.

---

## 1. The Big Picture

**1.1** What should we call this project?

> 

**1.2** In one sentence, what problem does this solve?

> 

**1.3** When this is done, what can you do that you can't do now?

> 

---

## 2. Who Uses This?

**2.1** Who is the main user? (Just you? Your team? Customers?)

> 

**2.2** Will different people need different access levels?

> [ ] No, everyone sees the same thing
> [ ] Yes  describe:

**2.3** How comfortable are your users with technology?

> [ ] Keep it simple
> [ ] They can handle apps
> [ ] They're technical

---

## 3. What Will You Create and Do?

**3.1** What "things" will you create or manage in this app?

> (Example: "Recipes, Ingredients" or "Trips, Hotels, Flights")

> 

**3.2** How do these things connect in your workflow?

> (Example: "A Recipe uses many Ingredients. Ingredients can appear in multiple Recipes.")

> 

**3.3** What will you DO most often? (Pick your top 3)

> [ ] Create new items
> [ ] Search/find existing items
> [ ] Edit or update items
> [ ] Share with others
> [ ] Export or print
> [ ] Review and approve
> [ ] Other:

---

## 4. Technical Preferences

**4.1** Where should this run?

> [ ] Web browser
> [ ] Phone app
> [ ] Desktop app
> [ ] Any/all

**4.2** Internet requirements?

> [ ] Always online is fine
> [ ] Must work offline
> [ ] Works offline, syncs when online

**4.3** Where should data live?

> [ ] Cloud (access anywhere)
> [ ] Local only (privacy)
> [ ] Both (sync between devices)

**4.4** Any absolute requirements?

> 

**4.5** Anything you definitely DON'T want?

> 

---

## 5. Inspiration

**5.1** Have you tried other tools? What did you like or dislike?

> 

**5.2** What vibe do you want?

> [ ] Minimal and clean
> [ ] Professional and polished
> [ ] Modern and sleek
> [ ] Playful and colorful
> [ ] Other:

---

## 6. Timeline

**6.1** How soon do you need this?

> [ ] No rush  quality over speed
> [ ] Within a few weeks
> [ ] Urgent  days

**6.2** Are we building the whole vision or starting small?

> [ ] Start with basics, add more later
> [ ] Build the full vision from the start

**6.3** Anything else we should know?

> 

---

**Thank you!** We'll review and prepare a proposal with industry references.

*Vanguard Class  Discovery Protocol v1.1*
